titleStmt.title: The corruption of minde. Described in a sermon preached at Pauls the 24. day of June, 1655. / By Richard Vines, preacher of Gods word at Laurence-Jury, London.
titleStmt.author: Vines, Richard, 1600?-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abel Roper at the Sun over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Error in paging: 10-11 appear twice (i.e. 12-13 are skipped).
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library, San Marino, California.

place.placeName: the Sun over against St. Dunstans Church in Fleet-street
